none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 09, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
At the risk of your world settling into a state of acceptance and/or complacency, I present Baltimore's ELAGABALUS. True freak synth psych/metal - there are guitars in there somewhere, but it's like GOBLIN and MONK MONTGOMERY reinterpreting one of those eyeliner mall metal bands.....dude, it's weird. After several trips on their journey, The Wizard isn't even sure if he likes ELAGABALUS, but still he keeps going back to the lab for more sonic research...and this is worth more than something - it is worth a lot.  ANTIQUARIAN BLACK MIDI

seo.title: Elagabalus - Antiquarian Black Midi - Terminal Escape
